misc: Bags Miura irons and is rumoured to sleep with them.
biography: Miso, a formidable presence on the greens, hails from the esteemed Hirsala Golf club. Known for his intense focus and unwavering dedication to the sport, Miso has become a familiar face at the Hector Trophée, marking his tenth appearance in 2025.
While Miso is admired for his stoicism on the course, those close to him know him as a passionate and humorous man, always ready with a witty remark to lighten the mood.

Bags Miura irons and is rumoured to sleep with them, Miso's singular pursuit of golfing excellence has led him to one victory at the Hector Trophée. Though the Victor Trophy has eluded him so far, Miso's fans are confident that he will soon add an individual title to his name.
As Miso continues to compete in Hector events, his determination and skill promise to make him a contender for years to come.
